name: The Dumb Sys Admin
body:
### About
My name is Dexter Plameras, and I live in Sydney Australia
I've worked in the IT industry for the whole spectrum of companies Banking/Finance, ISP, Telecommunications, Dot.Com and Start Ups.

I have an interest in all things Linux, Coding and Coding Practices.
I love hiking when I'm not getting lost, especially long distances.

[Linkedin](http://au.linkedin.com/in/dexterplameras)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
